landing.subtitle: Responsible product rentals and sustainable essentials, directly in hotel lobbies and common areas. Everything tracked, reused, recycled, or donated.
landing.step1_desc: Guest finds the hub in the lobby or on their floor. Rentals for the stay, essentials to keep.
landing.step2_desc: Quality EU-sourced products. Beach gear, tech, hygiene â€” everything a guest needs.
landing.step3_desc: Rentals returned at checkout. Purchases yours to keep â€” optionally return packaging for recycling.
landing.promise_title: "What we sell, we take care of."
landing.promise_sub: Reuse Â· Recycle Â· Donate responsibly

investors.meta_description: Scalable circular hospitality platform. â‚¬700/month net per hotel, 3-5 month payback, EU market.
investors.meta_og_description: Scalable circular hospitality platform targeting Europe's hotel market. Proven unit economics.
investors.hero_subtitle: A dual-revenue platform embedded in Europe's hotel infrastructure. Zero-capex for hotels removes adoption barriers. Circular operations create ESG value and reduce cost of goods.
investors.concept_subtitle: A circular hospitality platform, not a vending machine.
investors.concept_what_desc: Compact sustainability hubs placed in hotel lobbies and floor areas. Rental products (tech, beach gear) and curated essentials (hygiene, sun care) â€” all EU-sourced.
investors.concept_how_desc: Hotels provide space at zero cost. GreenStay Hub handles installation, stocking, maintenance, and circular operations. Hotels earn 15â€“25% revenue share.
investors.concept_why_desc: EU CSRD 2026 requires sustainability reporting from large companies. Hotels need ESG data. Guests expect responsible options. The market is ready.
investors.economics_subtitle: Single hotel model â€” mid-sized property (80â€“150 rooms), Costa del Sol.
investors.economics_revenue_rentals_detail: 100 rooms Ã— 70% occ. Ã— 15% conversion Ã— â‚¬6 avg.
investors.economics_revenue_essentials_detail: 100 rooms Ã— 70% occ. Ã— 25% conversion Ã— â‚¬8 avg.
investors.economics_disclaimer: All figures are estimates based on market research. Pilot data will replace these assumptions. Peak season (Mayâ€“Oct) could increase figures 30â€“50%.
investors.scaling_subtitle: Linear economics. Each hotel adds â‚¬700/month net contribution.
investors.scaling_disclaimer: Assumes consistent hotel size and performance. Variation across properties and seasonal fluctuations will occur.
investors.revenue_subtitle: Dual revenue model with emerging ESG opportunity.
investors.revenue_rentals_desc: Guests borrow reusable products (power banks, speakers, beach gear). High margins through multiple rental cycles per product.
investors.revenue_rentals_examples: Power bank â‚¬2/day Â· Speaker â‚¬3/day Â· Beach kit â‚¬5/day
investors.revenue_essentials_desc: Guests purchase everyday items (hygiene, sun care, adapters). Standard retail margin on EU-sourced goods. Fair pricing below hotel markup.
investors.revenue_essentials_examples: Sunscreen â‚¬8â€“12 Â· Charger â‚¬8â€“12 Â· Toothbrush kit â‚¬3â€“5
investors.revenue_bundles_desc: Pre-configured product combinations at a discount. Increase average transaction value and simplify guest decisions.
investors.revenue_bundles_examples: Beach Bundle â‚¬12 Â· Tech Bundle â‚¬10 Â· Essentials Bundle â‚¬8
investors.revenue_esg_desc: Hotel chains pay for branded sustainability reporting. Circular economy credits. Co-investment in hub deployment.
investors.revenue_esg_examples: Not active in pilot phase â€” part of long-term model
investors.circular_subtitle: Every product has a defined lifecycle. Nothing is wasted.
investors.roadmap_subtitle: Each phase gated by the success of the previous one. Data-driven, not assumption-driven.
investors.roadmap_phase1_detail: Validate concept, prove unit economics, refine circular model. 6-month evaluation.
investors.roadmap_phase2_detail: Test logistics efficiency with multiple properties. Build local brand. Repeatable onboarding.
investors.roadmap_phase3_detail: Prove model across hotel types and sizes. Regional logistics infrastructure. Hotel association relationships.
investors.roadmap_phase4_detail: Multi-property agreements with hotel chains. Standardised offering. Central ESG dashboard.
investors.roadmap_phase5_detail: Balearics, Canaries, Algarve, Greek islands, Italian coast, Croatia. Local suppliers and logistics.
investors.roadmap_timeline_text: Phase 2 starts 3â€“6 months after pilot. Phase 3 follows 6â€“12 months later. Phase 4 runs in parallel. Phase 5 begins 12â€“24 months after chain partnerships.
investors.levers_rental_desc: More rentals per product before end-of-life = higher margin. A power bank rented 50 times replaces 50 purchases.
investors.levers_conversion_desc: Small increases in guest adoption significantly impact revenue. 15% â†’ 20% adds ~â‚¬200/month per hotel.
investors.levers_bundle_desc: Bundles increase average transaction value with minimal additional cost. 10â€“15% of revenue at steady state.
investors.levers_logistics_desc: As hotel density increases in a region, restocking cost per hotel decreases. Route optimisation at scale.
investors.cta_subtitle: We'd welcome the opportunity to share more detail on the model, the market, and the path ahead.
investors.cta_contact: hello@greenstayhub.com Â· Fuengirola, Costa del Sol

about.meta_description: GreenStay Hub makes sustainability the default in hospitality. Based in Fuengirola, Costa del Sol.
about.meta_og_description: Making sustainability the default in hospitality. Based in Fuengirola, Costa del Sol, Spain.
about.hero_subtitle: GreenStay Hub exists to make sustainability the default in hospitality â€” not an upgrade, not a premium option, but the standard way hotels serve their guests.
about.story_p1: Hotels generate enormous amounts of waste from single-use products that guests buy, use once, and leave behind. At the same time, guests increasingly want responsible options â€” but not at the expense of convenience.
about.story_p2: GreenStay Hub bridges this gap. We place compact hubs in hotel lobbies and common areas, offering high-quality rental products and curated essentials from European manufacturers. Guests get what they need. Hotels get a zero-investment amenity with real sustainability data. Products stay in circulation as long as possible.
about.story_p3: When a product reaches end-of-life, it's recycled through appropriate channels. When it's still functional but no longer rental-grade, it enters our donation stream â€” sold second-hand with 100% of proceeds going to environmental NGOs.
about.story_p4: Nothing is wasted. Nothing is forgotten.
about.values_circularity_desc: Every product has a defined path: reuse, recycle, or donate. We follow the waste hierarchy â€” reuse first, dispose only as last resort.
about.values_greenwashing_desc: We don't claim 100% circularity. We track what we can measure and report honestly. No vague terms, no empty promises.
about.values_choice_desc: Returns are convenient, never compulsory. Rentals are returned at checkout. Purchased items are yours â€” optional return for recycling only.
about.values_sourcing_desc: All products come from Spanish or EU manufacturers. Shorter supply chains, higher standards, support for local economies.
about.promise_title: "What we sell, we take care of."
about.promise_subtitle: Reuse Â· Recycle Â· Donate responsibly
about.promise_desc: This is our operational commitment. Every product that passes through GreenStay Hub has a defined lifecycle. We track it, we report it, and we take responsibility for it.
about.location_subtitle: Our pilot launches in Fuengirola, on Spain's Costa del Sol â€” one of Europe's most popular tourist destinations with over 300 days of sunshine per year.
about.contact_subtitle: Whether you're a hotel, an investor, a potential partner, or simply curious â€” we'd love to hear from you.

hotels.meta_description: Zero-investment sustainability hub for your hotel. No upfront cost, no staff needed. ESG data included.
hotels.hero_desc: GreenStay Hub is a fully managed sustainability service. We install, stock, maintain, and operate everything. You provide the space â€” and earn revenue from day one.
hotels.pillar1_desc: No upfront cost. No equipment purchase. No inventory investment. GreenStay Hub covers installation, stock, and all hardware.
hotels.pillar1_highlight: You provide the space. That's it.
hotels.pillar2_desc: We handle all restocking and maintenance. Product selection, pricing, and lifecycle management are fully managed.
hotels.pillar2_highlight: You don't need to hire, train, or manage anyone.
hotels.pillar3_desc: Every product is tracked through its lifecycle. You receive regular reports: reused products, recycled kilos, donations generated.
hotels.pillar3_highlight: Ready for Green Key, EU Ecolabel, and CSRD reporting.
hotels.pillar4_desc: Guests get quality EU-sourced products they actually need. Rentals mean they don't buy things they'll only use once.
hotels.pillar4_highlight: Thoughtful service, not a commercial add-on.
hotels.timeline_title: From contract to live in 1â€“2 weeks
hotels.timeline_subtitle: We do the work. You enjoy the results.
hotels.step1_desc: We visit your property to assess placement (lobby, floor areas), logistics flow, and number of units.
hotels.step2_desc: We agree on placement, revenue model, restocking schedule, and terms.
hotels.step3_desc: Hub hardware is delivered and installed. Initial stock is loaded. 2â€“4 hours per hub unit.
hotels.step4_desc: Short session for your team: what the hub is, how guests use it, and who to call if needed.
hotels.step5_desc: Hub is operational. Guests can rent and purchase from day one.
hotels.revenue_subtitle: You earn from a service you don't manage.
hotels.revenue_share_desc: You receive 15â€“25% of all hub revenue at your property. Aligns your incentives with hub performance.
hotels.revenue_share_best: Best for: hotels that want upside potential.
hotels.fixed_fee_desc: Predictable monthly payment regardless of performance. GreenStay Hub takes the volume risk.
hotels.fixed_fee_best: Best for: hotels that prefer budget certainty.
hotels.revenue_note: Based on mid-sized hotel (80â€“150 rooms) on Costa del Sol. Figures are estimates â€” pilot data will replace assumptions.
hotels.esg_subtitle: Measurable sustainability evidence without building your own program.
hotels.esg_note: Reports are formatted for Green Key, EU Ecolabel, and CSRD compliance. Include them in your annual sustainability report, share with guests, or submit to certification bodies.
hotels.faq1_q: What does it cost the hotel?
hotels.faq1_a: Nothing. GreenStay Hub covers all hardware, installation, stock, and operations. The hotel provides space â€” that's it.
hotels.faq2_q: Do we need to allocate staff?
hotels.faq2_a: No. We handle restocking, maintenance, returns, and guest support. Your staff gets a short 30â€“60 minute briefing, but they have no ongoing duties.
hotels.faq3_a: In the lobby and/or on each floor (max one unit per floor). Never in guest rooms. Exact placement is decided during site assessment.
hotels.faq4_a: You earn 15â€“25% of all hub revenue at your property, or a fixed monthly fee â€” whichever you prefer. Both models mean zero financial risk for the hotel.
hotels.faq5_q: What happens if a guest doesn't return a rental?
hotels.faq5_a: The agreed replacement price is charged to the guest's room bill. Guest keeps the product. No follow-up, no friction.
hotels.faq6_q: How does this help our ESG reporting?
hotels.faq6_a: We track every product through its lifecycle and deliver regular reports with reuse, recycling, and donation metrics â€” formatted for Green Key, EU Ecolabel, and CSRD submissions.
hotels.faq7_a: From contract to live roughly 1â€“2 weeks. Physical installation takes 2â€“4 hours per hub unit.
hotels.cta_desc: No investment. No risk. We'd love to show you how it works at your property.
hotels.cta_footer: hello@greenstayhub.com Â· Fuengirola, Costa del Sol

guests.meta_description: Quality EU-sourced products for your hotel stay. Rent what you need, buy essentials to keep. Fair prices.
guests.hero_desc: Rent gear for your trip. Buy essentials to keep. Find us in the lobby or on your floor. Quality EU-sourced products at fair prices.
guests.rentals_desc: Borrow for your stay. Return at checkout â€” via the return slot or front desk. If you want to keep it, the replacement price is charged to your room. No questions asked.
guests.essentials_desc: Buy and keep. They're yours to take home. If you'd like, leave the product or packaging in the return slot â€” we'll recycle it responsibly. Fully optional.
guests.products_note: All prices are indicative. Product availability may vary by season.
guests.returns_desc: Find the return slot next to the hub in the lobby or on your floor, or leave items at reception.
guests.returns_rentals_desc: Return it at checkout â€” via the return slot or front desk. If you don't return it, the replacement price is charged automatically. You keep the product.
guests.returns_essentials_desc: It's yours to keep. If you'd like, return the product or packaging (return slot or reception) â€” we'll recycle it responsibly. Fully optional.
guests.promise_title: What we sell, we take care of.
